nodes.text: The vynock was an atmosphere-breathing subspecies of the mynock. They were native to the planet Kalarba, but could also be found on Corellia, Talus and Bothawui.

Vynocks were leathery, winged creatures covered in small tentacles. Vynocks had no arms or legs, and scoured the rocky mountains of for metals to eat. They would also terrorize settlements by infesting buildings, starships, and structures as well as tormenting livestock and other beings. Apparently, these creatures did not possess the helium allergy that mynocks had.
